sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_B101Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , MAN_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #manSeilNum# , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #datCd# , #busnid# , #tradeNm# , #manSum# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_B101Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , MAN_SEIL_NUM=#manSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , MAN_SUM=#manSum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND MAN_SEIL_NUM=#manSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_B101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND MAN_SEIL_NUM=#manSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , MAN_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_B101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND MAN_SEIL_NUM=#manSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MAN_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , MAN_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_B101Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , MAN_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_B101Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
